subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Francisco Liriano's emergence has coincided with the Twins’ wild-card run, but he committed the ultimate sin for a young player by misleading his team on the condition of his left elbow.
snippet: Francisco Liriano's emergence has coincided with the Twins’ wild-card run, but he committed the ultimate sin for a young player by misleading his team on the condition of his left elbow.
